summary: Contact Info: 612-750-8939 and/or mnbpeters@gmail.comMy formula for success is a unique mixture of persistence and customer support, which allows me to quickly establish credibility, earn trust, and turn prospects into customers.It’s all about connecting with the customer. But how do you get through to your customers and prospects, given all the e-mails and messages they receive? How do you make your message stand out? Do buzz words like Omnichannel or Digital Orchestration help? The answer is that you have to know your customer----and customize your approach based on what they want. One thing remains the same: clients buy from people they like and trust.I am open to Full Time, 3/4 Time, Contract, and Temp Opportunities Professional Experience and Strengths include: New Customer Acquisition, Account Management, Solution Sales, Custom Software, Customer Advocacy, Internal Team Building,  Long Term Relationships, Digital Marketing Campaigns, Listening instead of Talking.
